E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1975
Subject: Progress of Mark Lemongello
Dear Sir,
Mark Lemongello has nothing more to prove at A Lakeland Tigers!
He has an ERA of 3.74 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1975
Subject: Progress of Frank Riccelli
Dear Sir,
Frank Riccelli is doing pretty good at A Lakeland Tigers!
He has an ERA of 3.58, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/8/1975
Subject: Progress of Dave Criscione
Dear Sir,
Dave Criscione is hitting the ball well at AA Montgomery Rebels!
He has an AVG of .278, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
